html.title: Anote Wallet
html.description: Anote Wallet | Anote crypto currency can be mined, sent, received, exchanged or sold and used right from the start to purchase ads on our Telegram ad channel - AnoteToday.

home.seedWarning: Save your seed words for backup purposes. You can find them in settings. You are responsible for your account.
home.mineInfo: To start mining Anote, click blue briefcase icon, connect Telegram and mine with a simple click of a button.
home.mineMessage: Anote can be mined in a simple way using Telegram messenger. You can read more about mining here.

send.feeMessage: Transaction fee is 0.001 Anotes no matter the amount.

exchange.exchangeMessage: Exchange was successful. The amount will show soon on your account.

bank.message: This section is under the development and it will be available in the next version.
bank.miningCycle:
You can close the app!
Mining cycle is now running. One block is around 1 minute.

app.error: An error happened. Please try again.

collectEarnings.notEnough: You don't have enough to withdraw.

qr.message: Scanning QR code will be available in the next version.

send.notEnough: You don't have enough on your account, the fee is 0.001 AINT.
send.gwNotAllowed: You can't send to Anote BSC gateway address.
send.gwMsg: Please notice! Gateway fee for sending to BSC chain is 0.1 ANOTE on Anote side and 0.005 BNB to withdraw on BSC side. The amount is limited to 2 anotes per withdraw.
send.gwMsgDis: Please notice! Gateway has been temporarily disabled. It will be enabled again in 24 hours.

bank.wrongCaptcha: Captcha code is wrong, please try again.
bank.wrongCode: Mining code is wrong, please try again.
bank.ipError: Sorry, there are too many miners on a single Internet connection.
bank.otherError: An error happened. Please unblock AnoteRobot Telegram bot to mine.

settings.aliasMinimumBalance: You need to have at least 0.001 AINT for this.
settings.aliasLimit: You can only use lowercase alphanumeric characters, dot, underscore, hyphen and @.

underConstruction: This feature is under construction and it will be available in the next version.
